content: Does anybody have any way to access Anders Kock's thesis? https://search.worldcat.org/title/12894972 (It's cited in a paper of Guitart's as A. KOCK, Limit monads in categories, Aarhus Univ. Math. Inst., pre- print séries n° 6, 1967 but I can't find digital evidence of this preprint's existence, even though Anders has a slightly earlier 1966 preprint still on his site) other than going to Houston, Chicago, or Aarhus?

You can get some part of it here: https://www.proquest.com/docview/302254966

I once found the whole thing, but I can't remeber where or how, so I'll just upload it here:
Kock-1967-Limit-Monads-in-Categories.pdf
Hm, not sure why I didn’t just ask you first, thanks!
Maybe someone should ask Anders if he would be willing to put it on his website?

Oh looks like Evan Patterson uploaded it. But anyway, I recently found it here and saw the thread
https://github.com/CategoryTheoryArchive/archive

99 pages but only 10 references in the bibliography!
